thread.title: BRIEF-Dova Pharmaceuticals Signs Distribution Agreement With Fosun Pharma For Mainland China And Hong Kong

title: BRIEF-Dova Pharmaceuticals Signs Distribution Agreement With Fosun Pharma For Mainland China And Hong Kong

organizations.name: brief-dova pharmaceuticals signs distribution agreement with fosun pharma for mainland china
mainland china and hong kong reuters staff   dova pharmaceuticals inc

text: 18 PM / Updated 7 minutes ago BRIEF-Dova Pharmaceuticals Signs Distribution Agreement With Fosun Pharma For Mainland China And Hong Kong Reuters Staff   Dova Pharmaceuticals Inc: * DOVA PHARMACEUTICALS SIGNS EXCLUSIVE DISTRIBUTION AGREEMENT WITH FOSUN PHARMA FOR MAINLAND CHINA AND HONG KONG * DOVA PHARMACEUTICALS - ‍DEAL THROUGH UNIT GRANTING FOSUN PHARMA EXCLUSIVE DEVELOPMENT,DISTRIBUTION RIGHTS OF AVATROMBOPAG IN MAINLAND CHINA, HONG KONG​ * DOVA PHARMACEUTICALS INC - ‍TERMS OF TRANSACTION INCLUDE AN UPFRONT PAYMENT, MILESTONE PAYMENTS, AND A FIXED TRANSFER PRICE FOR PRODUCT SUPPLIED​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
